00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory
00003  * Package: 
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp.cc,v 1.2 2007/05/10 11:59:41 fwinkl Exp $
00005  * Description:
00006  *   Implementation of D -> Ks K- pi+ Dalitz amplitude
00007  *   Can also handle D -> Ks K+ pi- (piCharge in constructor)
00008  * History:
00009  *   11 Apr 2007, created, Frank Winklmeier
00010  *
00011  * Copyright (C) 2007 Colorado State University and SLAC
00012  *****************************************************************************/

00025 // Constructor
00026 BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp::BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp(const char * name, 
00027                                        const char * title, 
00028                                        BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00029                                        Int_t componentsBit,
00030                                        Int_t piCharge) :
00031   BdkAbsDDalitzAmp(name, title, pdf, componentsBit),
00032   _piCharge(piCharge)
00033 {
00034   initResonance();
00035   createParams();
00036   registerParams(_pdf);
00037 }

00047   //return _pdf->efficiency(m12, m13);

00051 
00052 void BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp::calDDbarNorm(int nEvents)
00053 {
00054   cout << GetName() << " does not implement calDDbarNorm() because it represents "
00055        << "a non C eigenstate. Use the normalization method of the appropriate "
00056        << "RooAbsPdf derived classs."
00057        << endl;
00058 }
00059 
00060 // initialize the components:
00061 void BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp::initResonance() 
00062 {
00063 
00064   if (nComps()!=0) {
00065     cout << "BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp::initResonance(): Cannot call initResonance more than once!" << endl;
00066     return;
00067   }
00068   
00069   // Define all RooRealVar floating observables.
00070 
00071   /* The trackinfo variable defines the cyclycal nature of the resonances
00072      and the final state pions, with the following order. 
00073      See enum ResDaughters.
00074 
00075      index   particle
00076      1       Ks
00077      2       pi+
00078      3       K-
00079      --------------
00080      index   resonance   dtr particles   dtr indices
00081      1                   pi+ K-          23
00082      2                   Ks  K-          13
00083      3                   Ks  pi+         12
00084   */
00085 
00086   int kstPIndex = -1;
00087   int kst0_1430PIndex = -1;
00088   int kst2_1430PIndex = -1;
00089   int kst1_1680PIndex = -1;
00090 
00091   // The same components are needed for D0 -> Ks K+ pi-
00092   TString sign, signBar;
00093   ResDaughters daug, daugBar;
00094   if (_piCharge<0) {
00095     sign = "-";
00096     signBar = "+";
00097     daug = PIM_PI0;
00098     daugBar = PI0_PIP;    
00099   }
00100   else {
00101     sign = "+";
00102     signBar = "-";
00103     daug = PI0_PIP;
00104     daugBar = PIM_PI0;
00105   }
00106 
00107   // Masses of the above daughters
00108   _mDaug[0] = 0.0;
00109   _mDaug[1] = BdkDalitz::K0MASS;
00110   _mDaug[2] = (_piCharge>=0 ? BdkDalitz::PIMASS : BdkDalitz::KMASS);
00111   _mDaug[3] = (_piCharge>=0 ? BdkDalitz::KMASS : BdkDalitz::PIMASS);
00112   
00113   // Ks pi+ resonances:
00114   if (KSTP & componentsBit()) {
00115     kstPIndex = nComps();
00116     addComp("Kst"+sign, 0.0, 0.0, 0.8917, 0.0508, daug, SPIN1);
00117   }
00118 
00119   if (KST0_1430P & componentsBit()) {
00120     kst0_1430PIndex = nComps();
00121     addComp("Kst0_1430"+sign, 0.0, 0.0, 1.414, 0.290, daug, SPIN0);
00122   }
00123 
00124   if (KST2_1430P & componentsBit()) {
00125     kst2_1430PIndex = nComps();
00126     addComp("Kst2_1430"+sign, 0.0, 0.0, 1.425, 0.099, daug, SPIN2);
00127   }
00128 
00129   if (KST1_1680P & componentsBit()) {
00130     kst1_1680PIndex = nComps();
00131     addComp("Kst1_1680"+sign, 0.0, 0.0, 1.717, 0.322, daug, SPIN1);
00132   }
00133 
00134   // K- pi+ resonances:
00135   if (KST & componentsBit()) {
00136     addComp("Kst", 0.0, 0.0, 0.8917, 0.0508, PIP_PIM, SPIN1, kstPIndex);
00137   }
00138 
00139   if (KST0_1430 & componentsBit()) {
00140     addComp("Kst0_1430", 0.0, 0.0, 1.414, 0.290, PIP_PIM, SPIN0, kst0_1430PIndex);
00141   }
00142 
00143   if (KST2_1430 & componentsBit()) {
00144     addComp("Kst2_1430", 0.0, 0.0, 1.425, 0.099, PIP_PIM, SPIN2, kst2_1430PIndex);
00145   }
00146 
00147   if (KST1_1680 & componentsBit()) {
00148     addComp("Kst1_1680", 0.0, 0.0, 1.717, 0.322, PIP_PIM, SPIN1, kst1_1680PIndex);
00149   }
00150   
00151   // Ks K- resonances:
00152   if (A0M & componentsBit()) {
00153     addComp("a0"+signBar, 0.0, 0.0, 0.9847, 0.092, daugBar, SPIN0, -1, A0RES);
00154   }
00155 
00156   if (A0_1450M & componentsBit()) {
00157     addComp("a0_1450"+signBar, 0.0, 0.0, 1.474, 0.265, daugBar, SPIN0);
00158   }
00159 
00160   if (A2_1310M & componentsBit()) {
00161     addComp("a2_1310"+signBar, 0.0, 0.0, 1.318, 0.107, daugBar, SPIN2);
00162   } 
00163     
00164    
00165   // Non-resonant:
00166   if (NONRES & componentsBit()) {
00167     addComp("Nonres", 1.03, 77, 0, 0, PIP_PIM_PI0, SPIN0);
00168   }
00169 
00170   // Parameters for a0 coupled channel BW
00171   _a0gEtaPi = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".a0-_gEtaPi",
00172                              TString(GetTitle()) + " a0-_gEtaPi^2",
00173                              0.324);
00174   _params.addOwned(*_a0gEtaPi);
00175 
00176   _a0gKK = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".a0-_gKK",
00177                           TString(GetTitle()) + " a0-_gKK^2",
00178                           0.329);
00179   _params.addOwned(*_a0gKK);
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 RooComplex BdkDDalitzKsKPiAmp::customME(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, Int_t i) const
00184 {
00185   Double_t s = kinematics(m12,m13,_trackinfo[i]);
00186    
00187   if (_typeRes[i]==A0RES)
00188     return a0Amp(s, _massRes[i]->getVal(),
00189                  _a0gEtaPi->getVal(), _a0gKK->getVal());
00190 
00191   cout << GetName() << ".customME() not implemented for resonance type "
00192        << _typeRes[i] << endl;
00193   return RooComplex(0,0);  
00194 }
